start.welcome: Welcome to Farmabuzer Bot. Use /start to go to the main menu.
start.access: This is a private telegram bot. Access is denied to you. To get access, contact your administrator. Your telegram ID: {id}

addProfile.step1: Adding a profile Enter the name of the profile:
addProfile.step2: Adding a profile Name: {name} Enter the initData How to get initData
addProfile.step3: Adding a profile Name: {name} Name: {initData} Enter the HTTP proxy Format: ip:port:login:password Example: 92.119.193.26:3000:x4oefdg2kv:p0asdasda1q ‚ùóONLY HTTP PROXY You can continue without a proxy, but we do not recommend that you do this, especially if you have more than one account in the game, this may lead to account blocking!
